subcategory_lists.title: Electric Vehicles (“EV”)
subcategory_lists.description: companies that produce electric/hybrid vehicles, including cars, trucks, motorcycles/scooters, buses, and electric rail.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 전기/하이브리드 차량을 생산하는 기업들, 자동차, 트럭, 오토바이/스쿠터, 버스, 전기철도 포함.

subcategory_lists.title: Electric Vehicle Components (“EVC”)
subcategory_lists.description: companies that produce electric/hybrid vehicle components, including electric drivetrains, lithium-ion and other types of electric batteries, and fuel cells. In addition, companies that produce the chemicals and raw materials (including but not limited to lithium and cobalt) that comprise these electric/hybrid vehicle components are eligible for inclusion.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 전기/하이브리드 차량 부품과 화학물질을 생산하는 기업들에 투자하면 됩니다.

subcategory_lists.title: Autonomous Vehicle Technology (“AVT”)
subcategory_lists.description: companies that build autonomous vehicles and/or develop hardware and software that facilitates the development of autonomous vehicles, including sensors, mapping technology, artificial intelligence, Advanced Driver Assistance Systems, ride-share platforms, and network-connected services for transportation.
subcategory_lists.description_kr: 자율 주행차를 제작하거나 자율 주행차 개발에 필요한 하드웨어와 소프트웨어를 개발하는 회사들. (키워드: 자율 주행차, 하드웨어, 소프트웨어)
